pr_title: HDDS-4581. Cleanup usage of volumeArgs in KeyRequests.

timeline.message: HDDS-4581. Cleanup usage of volumeArgs in KeyRequests.

timeline.bodyText: Why we not remove omVolumeArgs variable defined in this method?
timeline.author: linyiqun

replies.bodyText: I missed it, thanks for catching it.
replies.author: bharatviswa504

timeline.author: linyiqun

timeline.bodyText: All the use of the getVolumeInfo method has been removed, so getVolumeInfo should not be needed, we can delete it.
timeline.author: captainzmc
